name: 东方驾考模拟器|Chinese Driving License Test
description: Want to take a driving test? Or are you ready to take the driving test? Then come and buy a driving test simulator. All questions are 2018 latest question bank, of course, we will update at any time to ensure that the question bank is complete.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Due E6300 or AMD althon X2 5000+ Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 7300GT or ATI X1600 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core I5 4170 or AMD FX 6300 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 9600GT or ATI HD4750
